name: MAYBELLINE Tattoo Studio Dip-Ink Liquid Eyeliner, Waterproof Eyeliner With Up to 24 Hour Wear, Black Track, 1 Count
short_description: Ultra-Long Lasting Waterproof Liquid Eyeliner: Delivers up to 24HR wear. Transfer, fade & sweat resistant for a wear you can count on. Felt dip applicator allows for an easy precise application without skipping for smooth and saturated color

Packaging may vary. What you receive may not be what is reflected on site. Mechanical Pencil Eyeliner. Rich, Creme Formula. Built in Sharpener and Smudger. Smudge-proof, Up to 16 hourss. Apply along lash line starting from inner corner of eye working outwards. For a smoky look, gently smudge line with built-in smudger. Warning: Eye cosmetics in a scratched, infected or irritated eye and scratches from cosmetic eye applicators can lead to eye damage, and in extreme cases, even blindness. If your eye is scratched, stop using all eye cosmetics and go to an ophthalmologist immediately. Never apply this product in a moving vehicle.

name: Milani The Tank Liquid Eyeliner - No-Skip, Waterproof, Long Lasting, Smudgeproof, Black, Cruelty-Free, 12 Hour Wear, Tips & Tricks
short_description: LIQUID EYELINER: Say hello to the perfect smudge proof eyeliner. Unlike other liners, The Tank Eyeliner features a unique storage tank that keeps all air out of the product.

WATERPROOF & LASTS 12 HOURS: The formula of this waterproof eyeliner stays fresh, giving you intensely black pigments and the ability to use up to 99% of the product. It glides on smoothly, never skips and dries down fast. Waterproof, transfer-proof and lasts 12 hours.
CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: This makeup product – and every other Milani product – is never tested on animals. We don’t allow others to test on our behalf, either. Our products are 100% cruelty free.

TIPS & TRICKS: Shake well. Starting at your eye's inner corner, trace your lash line, sticking as close to your lashes as possible. Build using small, gradual strokes. Remove with an oil-based makeup remover.

WE ARE MILANI: Born in East LA, we've always been connected to the rich diversity of our neighborhood, because it’s a place that truly embodies the melting pot of Los Angeles. We're not inspired by couture and top models. Our passion is real people, living real lives. Beauty is for everyone. No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.

short_description: 【Ultra-Fine 0.1mm Tip for Cat Eye Liner Precision】Create defined cat eye liner looks with this liquid eyeliner pen featuring an ultra-fine 0.1mm tip. Perfect for both subtle and dramatic black liquid eyeliner styles, this makeup eyeliner allows for detailed and precise lines.

Our liquid eyeliner waterproof technology locks sharp lines in place, staying flawless all day, no matter how much you touch or brush your eyes. Perfect for active days, busy schedules, and emotional moments alike.

【All-Day Wear, Day-to-Night Perfection】Enjoy bold, dramatic color with this black liquid eyeliner waterproof pen. The silky formula glides on smoothly for inky definition that lasts all day. Perfect for a polished daytime look or a striking cat eye liner for nights out. No matter where you go, your makeup eyeliner stays flawless and ready for every occasion.

【Nourishing, Hypoallergenic Eyeliner Formula】Carefully crafted with aloe vera, rosehip oil, collagen, and hyaluronic acid, this hypoallergenic eyeliner soothes and protects the delicate eye area. Ideal for sensitive eyes and everyday wear.

【Easy Removal by Warm Water by Japanese Kiss Me Eyeliner】Despite its strong long lasting eyeliner and waterproof properties, this kiss me eyeliner can be removed easily with warm water—no need for strong makeup removers. Experience the convenience of black liquid eyeliner that’s easy to remove whenever you choose.
